channel.title: Tutorial Island Help Plox
channel.description: So, the problem sounds extremely easy, but it's not. I am using RuneSource, and was in the process of creating a tutorial island. I've finished all my dialogues and what not, but when I try talking to the Runescape Guide on tutorial island, his dialogues won't show up, but rather the dialogue a man npc, or women npc, would say. If you have any idea how to fix this, please let me know... it's been a real ball-buster.

item.title: Tutorial Island Help Plox
item.dc:creator: @Rs2-Remake Rs2-Remake
item.description:
@Rs2-Remake wrote:

So, the problem sounds extremely easy, but it’s not. I am using RuneSource, and was in the process of creating a tutorial island. I’ve finished all my dialogues and what not, but when I try talking to the Runescape Guide on tutorial island, his dialogues won’t show up, but rather the dialogue a man npc, or women npc, would say. If you have any idea how to fix this, please let me know… it’s been a real ball-buster.

Read full topic
